niyama washayen jaliya alewi karanaya haduna ganima kala yuthuyi.ese nowanne nam ee thulin uparima wasi laba ganna aayathanayan washayen piramida kramayan thulin mudal gara ganim saha ithamath kapati andamin mudal upaya ganima karamin minisun rawatamin mema duppathun dhanapathiyan bawata path karanu labana ithamath pahasu kramaya wala pallata damamin sitina pirisakda warthamanaye shri lankawa thuladi daknata laabana bawin ithamath kalpana kariwa mema jaliya alewi karaweku washayen thama yuthukam kotasa manewin kala yuthuyi.
